title: Tablecover, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal-wrapped silk
Technique: satin, stem, and knot stitches on plain weave; couching on metallic threads
description: Ivory taffeta embroidered in bright colors with chinoiserie-style figures supported by silver scrolls and interspersed with flowers. The central panel has three figures beneath a parasol with figures in each corner. The whole group is surmounted by a crescent. The field is sprinkled with birds, butterflies and floral sprigs. The border has architectural elements with birds, owls and acrobats.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tablecover, 18th century. Medium: silk, metal-wrapped silk
Technique: satin, stem, and knot stitches on plain weave; couching on metallic threads. 1967-46-1.
